item.title: Adventure through a fantasy world
item.description: Explore forests, caves, towns and more, all rendered in colorful, retro-inspired pixel art. Talk to a variety of characters and creatures, find secret areas, shortcuts and hidden items, and uncover a plot that only you can solve.

item.title: Fight a Variety of Enemies
item.description: Rely on your reflexes as you dodge, block and attack your way through a diverse set of enemies intent to stop you in your task. Learn the timing of your enemies attack patterns and exploit them.

item.title: Find a Vast Arsenal of Weapons, Items and Armor
item.description: Acquire and equip a variety of weapons, armor and items to customize your playstyle. No classes or restrictions means you can customize your build however you want. Build into classic archetypes like a heavy-armored knight, light and nimble spellcaster, or mix and match and create your own build!

item.title: Ambitious Ales Event
item.description: A most excellent event, Ambitious Ales Indie Game Night put on by Max and OC Drawing Royale! We had an awesome time playing games like “Rookie of the Year” by Two Rabbit Games and Hexachessagon by Spherous Games just to name a couple. Watching folks play Realm Uniter and getting our first feedback was so valuable. Thank you! The artists who drew pieces inspired by the handful of games did incredible work!

item.title: Thanks for Signing Up!
item.description: You’ll receive a verification e-mail shortly that contains a link which you need to visit in order to confirm your subscription.
